name: Captain Thom - A platform hero who can't move
name_original: Captain Thom - A platform hero who can't move
description:
Captain Thom is a Pirate who lost the ability to Walk and Jump by the effect of a terrible Curse.

Join him in his Platforming adventure by helping him moving around using a strong fan that will make him float around!

Developers and Game Designers: 

Michele Papucci (https://twitter.com/nickhinnow) and 

Jacopo Monelli (https://twitter.com/jacopomonelli)

Artists:

Sami Armand (https://samiarmand.itch.io/) and

LethalKitten#3824 (Katie of WALRUSWARE™ 2018)

Musician:

Jozzua Lance (https://soundcloud.com/jozzua-lance)
